Text.Page:
We ended up establishing our camp here because it was foolish to battle our way through so many creatures. Needless to say, Isobel was not amused.

If you eliminated some of the {@LinkCreature:29#3021#ghilliedhu wardens} and {@LinkCreature:29#3022#ghilliedhu guardians}, we might be able to continue with the original plan.

If I commanded a squad of soldiers like you, , the argons would be in full retreat and the rank of exarch would be mine.

Excellent work with the ghilliedhus, soldier.
